Uses of Class
xxl.core.cursors.mappers.Aggregator

  • Packages that use Aggregator 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.cursors.groupers
    The package xxl.core.cursors.groupers provides miscellaneous implementations of the group operator on cursors.
    xxl.core.cursors.mappers
    The package xxl.core.cursors.mappers provides miscellaneous implementations of mapping operators on cursors.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates provides several aggregate functions for nonparametric estimators.
    xxl.core.relational.cursors
    The package provides a whole algebra of cursors that extends the functionality of the classes cursors.
    xxl.core.spatial.cursors
    Provides mappers for different type of Point and Rectangle objects as well as several join algorithms: nested loops distance similarity-join for Points, the spatial join algorithm based on space-filling curves proposed by Jack Orenstein, similarity-join algorithm "GESS: Generic External Space Sweep" and hash-based plane sweep for two-dimensional data.

    • Uses of Aggregator in xxl.core.cursors.groupers

      Subclasses of Aggregator in xxl.core.cursors.groupers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Minimator<E,M>
      The minimator is an aggregator that computes the minimal element for a given input iteration (lazy evaluation).

    • Uses of Aggregator in xxl.core.cursors.mappers

      Subclasses of Aggregator in xxl.core.cursors.mappers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ReservoirSampler
      This class shows how to make use of the reservoir-sampling function.

    • Uses of Aggregator in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates

      Methods in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates that return Aggregator 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Aggregator Aggregators.getAdaptiveKernelBasedAggregator(Function factory, Iterator input, KernelFunction kf, int bandwidthType, int blocksize, RealFunction weights, boolean realMode)
      Returns an iterator of type aggregator delivering estimators as result of the aggregation.
      static Aggregator Aggregators.getEmpiricalCDFAggregator(Iterator input, int sampleSize, int samplingType)
      Returns an iterator of type aggregator delivering an empirical cdf as result of the aggregation.
      static Aggregator Aggregators.getNKCDFAggregator(Iterator input, KernelFunction kf, int sampleSize, int samplingType, int bandwidthType)
      Returns an iterator of type aggregator delivering a native kernel cdf as result of the aggregation.
      static Aggregator Aggregators.getNKDEAggregator(Iterator input, KernelFunction kf, int sampleSize, int samplingType, int bandwidthType)
      Returns an iterator of type aggregator delivering a native kernel density estimator as result of the aggregation.
      static Aggregator Aggregators.getReservoirBasedKernelEstimatorAggregator(Iterator input, AggregationFunction kernelBasedAggregateFunction, int sampleSize, int samplingType)
      Returns an iterator of type aggregator delivering estimators as result of the aggregation.
      static Aggregator Aggregators.getRKCDFAggregator(Iterator input, KernelFunction kf, int sampleSize, int samplingType, int bandwidthType)
      Returns an iterator of type aggregator delivering a reflection kernel cdf as result of the aggregation.
      static Aggregator Aggregators.getRKDEAggregator(Iterator input, KernelFunction kf, int sampleSize, int samplingType, int bandwidthType)
      Returns an iterator of type aggregator delivering an reflection kernel density estimator using reflection as the result of the aggregation.
      static Aggregator Aggregators.getSplineCompressedAdaptiveAggregator(Function factory, Iterator input, int blocksize, RealFunction weights, double left, double right, int n, boolean realMode, boolean cdfMode)
      Returns an iterator of type aggregator delivering estimators based on a FACTORY as result of the aggregation.
      static Aggregator Aggregators.getSplineCompressedAdaptiveEmpiricalCDFAggregator(Iterator input, int blocksize, RealFunction weights, int n)
      Returns an iterator of type aggregator delivering empirical cdf's as result of the aggregation.
      static Aggregator Aggregators.getSplineCompressedAdaptiveKernelBasedAggregator(Function factory, Iterator input, KernelFunction kf, int bandwidthType, int blocksize, RealFunction weights, double left, double right, int n, boolean realMode, boolean cdfMode)
      Returns an iterator of type aggregator delivering kernel based estimators as result of the aggregation.
      static Aggregator Aggregators.getSplineCompressedAdaptiveKernelBasedAggregator(Function factory, Iterator input, KernelFunction kf, int bandwidthType, int blocksize, RealFunction weights, int n, boolean realMode, boolean cdfMode)
      Returns an iterator of type aggregator delivering kernel based estimators as result of the aggregation.

    • Uses of Aggregator in xxl.core.relational.cursors

      Subclasses of Aggregator in xxl.core.relational.cursors 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Aggregator
      The aggregator computes aggregates like SUM, COUNT and VARIANCE for an input metadata cursor.
      class  GroupAggregator
      The aggregator computes aggregates like SUM, COUNT and VARIANCE for a grouped input metadata cursor, i.e., an input cursor delivering groups (cursors) of input elements.

    • Uses of Aggregator in xxl.core.spatial.cursors

      Subclasses of Aggregator in xxl.core.spatial.cursors 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RectangleUniverseDouble
      The RectangleUniverseDouble computes the universe (Minimal Bounding Rectangle, MBR or MBB) for an Iterator of DoublePoints.
      class  UniverseDouble
      The UniverseDouble computes the universe (Minimal Bounding Rectangle, MBR or MBB) for an Iterator of DoublePoints.
      class  UniverseFloat
      The UniverseFloat computes the universe (Minimal Bounding Rectangle, MBR or MBB) for an Iterator of FloatPoints.
